TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Window/MdiSysButton extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::Window::MdiSysButton abstract sealed

summary.span: 使用视觉样式为多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗口的“系统”按钮的每种状态提供 对象。

span.span: Provides objects for each state of the **System** button of a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window with visual styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个属性类获取不同状态的**系统**的 MDI 子窗口的按钮。Each property of the class gets a for a different state of the **System** button of an MDI child window. 此按钮将打开**窗口**菜单 (也称为**系统**菜单或**控件**菜单) 时单击它。This button opens the **Window** menu (also known as the **System** menu or **Control** menu) when it is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建与返回属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a with the returned by the property. 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. 处理窗体的事件并调用`DrawVisualStyleElementWindowMdiSysButton1`方法从事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为。Handle the form’s event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowMdiSysButton1` method from the event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#367](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#367)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#367](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#367)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Disabled As VisualStyleElement

summary.span: 获取表示处于禁用状态的多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗口的“系统”按钮的视觉样式元素。

span.span: Gets a visual style element that represents the **System** button of a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window in the disabled state.

value.span: A表示**系统**按钮处于禁用状态的 MDI 子窗口。

span.span: A that represents the **System** button of an MDI child window in the disabled state.

summary.span: 获取表示处于热状态的多文档界面 (MDI) 子窗口的“系统”按钮的视觉样式元素。

span.span: Gets a visual style element that represents the **System** button of a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window in the hot state.

value.span: A表示**系统**的 MDI 子窗口在热状态的按钮。

span.span: A that represents the **System** button of an MDI child window in the hot state.
